appName: BMX Fury - Bike Racing Games : Bike Games
displayName: BMX Fury - Bike Racing Games : Bike Games
display_name: BMX Fury - Bike Racing Games : Bike Games
display_long_description:
Get ready for the ultimate BMX cycling adventure! Race through breathtaking offroad tracks on a variety of bikes. Test your skills against AI or challenge real players in thrilling 1v1 battles. Unlock rewards, customize your rider, and conquer challenging tracks. Experience the thrill of BMX cycling with realistic physics and stunning visuals. Are you ready to race to victory?

BMX Cycle Racing - Bike Games Features:
- Thrilling bicycle riding gameplay with realistic physics
- Multiple game cycle racing modes
- Wide range of bicycles with unique attributes in bike games
- Unlockable rewards, and accessories to personalise your smx rider
- Stunning offroad tracks set in visually striking environments
- Intuitive BMX cycle racing controls for a smooth gaming experience
- Compete against bike life AI opponents or challenge real players worldwide
- Engaging multiplayer modes for intense real smx cycling battles
- Expand smx cycling skills and conquer challenging tracks in bike racing games
- Offline and free game to play
